tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE material_metrics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    recyclable BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    biodegradable BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    weight FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES packaging_materials(id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaterialMetrics (
  metrics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT NOT NULL,
  thickness DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  weight DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_material FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES PackagingMaterial(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SustainabilityReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  packaging_id INT NOT NULL,
  supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  sustainability_score INT NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_packaging FOREIGN KEY (packaging_id) REFERENCES PackagingMetrics(packaging_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_supplier FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Supplier(supplier_id)
);
